title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect statement about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrectly states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The issue is that the custom cookie name specified in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is not being used for URL rewriting in the current trunk.
EB: Expected result: When the custom cookie name specified in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 is used, the Reload link should have the form 'http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F' instead of using the default 'jsessionid'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Deploy the attached cookiename.war
2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
